title: Support Update
content: Support Documentation Update Summary Updated internal support documentation to reflect recent system changes. Changes - Added troubleshooting steps for invoice discrepancies - Updated escalation contacts - Clarified expected turnaround times for billing issues Audience Support and Customer Success teams This is a test file.

title: Bugfix Description
content: Bug Fixes for Reporting Dashboard Issues Addressed - Fixed intermittent errors on the dashboard charts caused by missing data fields. - Improved error messages and loading indicators for a smoother user experience. Related Issue - #202

title: Home
content: Salesforce GitHub Test Documentation Welcome to the documentation repository for the Salesforce GitHub Test project. This site provides comprehensive documentation for features, bug fixes, security updates, and support resources. What's New This repository contains documentation for: - Features: New functionality and API integrations - Bug Fixes: Resolved issues and improvements - Security Updates: Critical security patches and enhancements - Support: Documentation and resources for support team

title: Invoice Calculation Fix
content: Invoice Calculation Fix Summary Resolved an issue where invoice totals could be off by a small margin due to rounding inconsistencies. Details - Updated rounding logic to occur after line-item aggregation - Ensures consistent totals across UI and exported reports Business Impact - Prevents billing discrepancies - Improves trust in financial reporting Risk Low. No schema changes. --- ← Back to Bug Fixes | Home

title: Security Patch - Authentication Vulnerability
content: Security Patch - Authentication Vulnerability Summary Closed a critical vulnerability affecting API authentication. All requests now require validated JWTs and legacy tokens are no longer accepted. Business Impact - Enhances system security. - Addresses audit compliance for customer data protection. Reference - Issue #404 --- ← Back to Bug Fixes | Home

title: Reporting Dashboard Bug Fixes
content: Bug Fixes for Reporting Dashboard Issues Addressed - Fixed intermittent errors on the dashboard charts caused by missing data fields. - Improved error messages and loading indicators for a smoother user experience. Related Issue - #202 --- ← Back to Bug Fixes | Home

title: Order Tracking API Integration
content: Feature 1 – Order Tracking API Integration Summary Introduced a new API integration for real-time order tracking. This allows users to view the status of their orders throughout the fulfillment process. Business Impact - Increases customer transparency. - Supports customer service with up-to-date order data. Technical Details - Integrated with carrier webhooks. - Updates reflected in user dashboard. --- ← Back to Features | Home

title: User Permission Audit Logging
content: Feature 2 – User Permission Audit Logging Summary Added detailed audit logging for changes to user permissions. Benefits - Supports compliance and security policy requirements. - Allows administrators to trace permission changes by user and timestamp. Implementation - All permission changes logged to the central audit log. - Accessible from Admin console. --- ← Back to Features | Home

title: Features
